nodes.text: The Sevari system was a star system located within the Outer Rim Territories' Chorlian sector. It shared its name with the colony ship Sevari Cabal, which carried settlers who eventually became the ancestors of the Sevari, the humanoid inhabitants of the Tamarin sector planet Sevarcos II.
The Sevari system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square S-4.
